content.content:
Azure Arc - Extended Security Updates (ESU) for Windows Server and SQL Server
This dashboard tracks ESU for Windows Server & SQL Server 2012/2014
SQL Server 2012 - End of Life - 12th July 2022
SQL Server 2014 - Planned End of Life - 9th July 2024

inputs.name: partTitle
inputs.value: Query 1

inputs.name: query
inputs.value:
//Query - All Arc Registered Windows 2012 Servers broken down by ESU assigned/not assigned
resources
| where type =~ 'microsoft.hybridcompute/machines'
| extend osSku = tostring(properties.osSku)
//ESU Assignment (esu eligibility - OS is ESU capable, License Assignment State - OS does/does not have ESU assigned
| extend ESU = tostring(properties.licenseProfile.esuProfile.licenseAssignmentState)
| extend esuEligibility = tostring(properties.licenseProfile.esuProfile.esuEligibility)
| extend esuCount = iff(ESU == "NotAssigned",0,1)
//Change to "Windows Server 2012" for live version
| where osSku contains "Windows Server 2012" 
| summarize ServerCount = count() by ESU

partHeader.title: Windows Server 2012 ESU License State
partHeader.subtitle: All WIndows Server 2012 servers by ESU license state

inputs.name: partTitle
inputs.value: Query 1

inputs.name: query

partHeader.title: SQL Server 2012 ESU License State
partHeader.subtitle: All SQL Server 2012 servers by ESU license state

inputs.name: partTitle
inputs.value: Query 1

inputs.name: query

partHeader.title: SQL Server 2014 ESU License State
partHeader.subtitle: All SQL Server 2014 servers by ESU license state

inputs.name: partTitle
inputs.value: Query 1

inputs.name: query

partHeader.title: Windows Server 2012 ESU not assigned by appllication
partHeader.subtitle: Windows Server 2012 servers with no ESU active by application

inputs.name: partTitle
inputs.value: Query 1

inputs.name: query

partHeader.title: SQL Server 2012 ESU not assigned by appllication
partHeader.subtitle: SQL Server 2012 servers with no ESU active by application

inputs.name: partTitle
inputs.value: Query 1

inputs.name: query
inputs.value:
resources
| where  type == "microsoft.azurearcdata/sqlserverinstances"
// Change to SQL Server 2014
| where tostring(properties['version']) == "SQL Server 2014"
| extend application = tostring(tags.Application)
//No ESU filter needed as no ESUs for 2014 yet
| summarize Servers=count() by application

partHeader.title: SQL Server 2014 servers with no ESU active by application
partHeader.subtitle: SQL Server 2014 servers with no ESU active by application

inputs.name: partTitle
inputs.value: Query 1

inputs.name: query
inputs.value:
resources
| where type == 'microsoft.hybridcompute/machines'
//Change to Windows Server 2012
| extend osSku = tostring(properties.osSku)
| where osSku contains "Windows Server 2012"
| extend esuLicense= tostring(properties.licenseProfile.esuProfile.licenseAssignmentState)
| join kind=inner (
    resourcecontainers
    | where type == 'microsoft.resources/subscriptions'
    | project subscriptionId, subScriptionName = name)
    on subscriptionId
| project subScriptionName , resourceGroup, esuLicense
| summarize ServerCount = count() by subScriptionName, resourceGroup, esuLicense

partHeader.title: Windows 2012 ESU Assignment by Subscription, Resource Group
partHeader.subtitle: Count of Windows Server 2012 servers assigned/not assigned

inputs.name: partTitle
inputs.value: Query 1

inputs.name: query

partHeader.title: Windows Server 2012 Standard vs Datacenter
partHeader.subtitle: Distribution of Windows Server 2012 Standard & Datacenter servers

inputs.name: partTitle
inputs.value: Query 1

inputs.name: query
inputs.value:
//Summary Query – reports a count of servers onboarded to Arc by Subscription, Resource Group, returning if ESU is activated or not
resources
| where type =~ 'microsoft.hybridcompute/machines'
| extend esuEligibility = tostring(properties.licenseProfile.esuProfile.esuEligibility)
//Select where Server is Eligible for ESUs
| where esuEligibility == "Eligible"
| extend ESUAttached = iff(properties.licenseProfile.esuProfile.licenseAssignmentState =="Assigned", 1, 0)
| join kind=inner (
    resourcecontainers
    | where type == 'microsoft.resources/subscriptions'
    | project subscriptionId, subscriptionName = name)
    on subscriptionId
| summarize percentESUAssigned = toint(
    round((todouble(sum(ESUAttached)) / count() * 100), 2)) by subscriptionName

partHeader.title: Percentage Windows Server ESU Assigned by Subscription
partHeader.subtitle: Percentage of WIndows Server ESUs of total ESU-eligible servers discovered

inputs.name: partTitle
inputs.value: Query 1

inputs.name: query

partHeader.title: SQL Server 2012 ESU Assignment by Subscription, Resource Group
partHeader.subtitle: Count of SQL Server 2012 servers assigned/not assigned

inputs.name: partTitle
inputs.value: Query 1

inputs.name: query

partHeader.title: SQL Server 2012 Editions
partHeader.subtitle: Distribution of SQL Server 2012 Developer, Standard & Enterprise edition

inputs.name: partTitle
inputs.value: Query 1

inputs.name: query
inputs.value:
resources
| where  type == "microsoft.azurearcdata/sqlserverinstances"
// Change to SQL Server 2014
//SQL Server Version & Edition
| extend version = tostring(properties.version)
| extend sqlEdition = tostring(properties.edition)
| extend SQLinstance = name
| where ['version'] == "SQL Server 2014"
| join kind=inner (
    resourcecontainers
    | where type == 'microsoft.resources/subscriptions'
    | project subscriptionId, subScriptionName = name)
    on subscriptionId
| project subScriptionName , resourceGroup
| summarize instanceCount = count() by subScriptionName, resourceGroup

partHeader.title: SQL Server 2014 Distribution by Subscription, Resource Group
partHeader.subtitle: Distribution of SQL Server 2014 across all Arc registered servers
